Desc.entry: Provides sheltered accommodation for elderly people who need not be Jewish. Priority is given to Jewish applicants, then to applicants aged 60 years and over and then in exceptional circumstances, applicants aged under 60 years. Accommodation is in 1 bedroom flats in Nether Edge. Resident warden. Managed by MHA care group.

category.entry: ACCOMMODATION FOR OLDER PEOPLE - SHELTERED HOUSING
